definition: He Long (1896-1969), important communist military leader, died from persecution during the Cultural Revolution
to congratulate
surname He
dragon/CL:條|条[tiao2]/imperial
surname Long

sentences.english: He Long's health had deteriorated while he was in prison. ;
sentences.chinese: 贺龙在狱中时健康已经越来越恶化了。

sentences.english: It is said that Saturday night in the stadium has he long a Jacky cheung's concert .
sentences.chinese: 据说周六晚上在贺龙体育馆有一场张学友的演唱会。
